snippet: Pakistani security forces killed 30 separatist militants on Monday in an offensive in Baluchistan, a senior official said, in one of the biggest clashes in months in the province.
abstract: Pakistani security forces kill 30 separatist militants in an offensive in Baluchistan, one of the biggest clashes in months in the province.
lead_paragraph: Pakistani security forces killed 30 separatist militants on Monday in an offensive in Baluchistan, a senior official said, in one of the biggest clashes in months in the province.

headline.main: Pakistan: Security Forces Press Offensive Against Separatists
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Security Forces Press Offensive Against Separatists
